summary: This is a brief email exchange from August 10, 2019, regarding the attachment of a document titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.docx'. The email chain shows someone confirming receipt or correction of a screenshot and referencing the statement document.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein statement document
events.description: An email exchange occurs regarding a screenshot and the attachment of a document named 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.docx'.

keyFacts: An email dated August 10, 2019, references a document titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.docx'.
The email chain includes a screenshot from August 10, 2019, at 2:39:44 PM.
The correspondence appears to be about confirming or correcting the attachment of the Epstein statement document.
